answers.answer: Could be low bp or I had similar symptoms and my Dr said it was because my blood vessels are dialated and I don't have enough blood to fill them but to increase my fluid intake.
Sounds like g diabetes book yourself into perinatal clinic to b tested between 24/28 weeks I think is the best time to test for it

Same thing happened to me when i was around 20 weeks pregnant they told me i.have low iran the baby is trying to control ur body and take everything so ur lossing a lot just eat healthy foods take prenatal Pills and can take some iran pill but ask ur doctor first.

I'm getting my glucose test on Wednesday of next wk see I'm hypoglycemic and i have never had this feeling ever idk what  having high blood sugar feels like so it might be, I've never had bp issues not even with my 1st pregnancy so I'm not sure if that could be either or not! I'm not sure on what i should do if have another episode like this again today
Yes this happens to me when I am really hungry and don't realize it. If 3 or 4 hours go buy and i dont eat anything this happens. Have you tried eating when you feel like this?
Yeah sometimes it happens even though i have ate, this is just too weird
Yes happened to me with my first pregnancy every day at work it would happen atleast once sometimes I'd faint. My issue was low blood sugar levels

question: I'm 20wks pregnant and today i had 3 episodes of feeling light headed, blurry vision, and my body gets really cold but I'm sweating really bad! The 2nd and 3rd time it happened it came with nose bleeds.. In total this has happened 2 me 10 times since i been pregnant, i told my ob about but she doesn't seem concerned. Has anyone had this happen to them and what did it turn out to be?
title: maybe low BP???
